item.description:
Join us for some coffee talk at the Barnes & Noble in Manchester. We'll be discussing a range of topics including:

1. The Boston Bombing
* Evidence of CIA/FBI involvement
* Effort underway in Watertown, MA for residents to speak out in Town Halls and demand investigations into the city lock-down and the bombings.
* Raise money/volunteers to put up fliers in Watertown

2. Porcfest - AltExpo
* Next month - thousands of libertarians to attend

3. Syria/Libya/Benghazi
* Whistleblowers speak in Congressional hearings about apparent "stand-down" order from above in illegal war in Libya
* Israel attacks Syria

4. Gun Control - Sandy Hook

5. 9/11 Truth - Why it still matters
* Outreach/dvds

And any other topics that you find interesting or want to discuss or promote.

I'll bring my laptop for viewing of information, articles, youtube videos, etc... we can also discuss better locations for documentary screenings and other future meetings.
item.name: Manchester - Barnes & Noble Coffee Talk
